com.android.build.transform.api
Interface TransformInput

@Beta
public interface TransformInput

The input to a Transform.

It is mostly composed of a list of JarInput and a list of DirectoryInput.

This API is non final and is subject to change. We are looking for feedback, and will attempt to stabilize it in the 1.6 time frame.

Method Summary
 java.util.Collection<DirectoryInput> getDirectoryInputs()
          Returns a collection of DirectoryInput.
 java.util.Collection<JarInput> getJarInputs()
          Returns a collection of JarInput.
